The ground floor living room is spacious and flows out to the pool deck and garden. A formal dining room and open kitchen are also incorporated into this space. The floor layout is completed by an elegant guest room.

The family room opens out to a wide balcony where an outdoor dining space can be set up. The villa also includes a maids room and a large service kitchen.
For our most discerning buyers, this villa would make for a splendid primary residence or second home in Dubai.']

ABOUT AL MAQTAA
Located near the grand architectural marvel, Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, Al Maqtaa is a huge residential area on the outskirts of Abu Dhabi. It is sometimes called Al Maqta or Al Maqta'a. The area was formerly known as Bain Al Jessrain, meaning 'between two bridges' in English. It is located in between Mussafah Bridge and Al Maqtaa Bridge.
One can mostly find villas in the district along with a handful of apartments available for rent. All properties feature contemporary infrastructure and are equipped with modern amenities.
IN A NUTSHELL
A quiet residential area towards the south of Abu Dhabi
There are mainly villas for rent and sale
Mostly preferred by families
It has all the facilities and services necessary for living

descriptions: ["DescriptionKAYE & CO REAL ESTATE L.L.C. welcomes you to this large 3 bedroom apartment located in the prestigious Burj Khalifa Tower.Property Details:\xa03 BR plus Maid's\xa0 and Study Room with 2,333 sqftPanoramic Living Room without any columns/pillarsViews of the DIFC, Sea and Partial Fountain2 Bathrooms plus Powder RoomMaster bedroom has a private corridor with large walk-in closetBuilt in TV Cabinet, Wine Chiller and Open Plan Kitchen2 Parking SpacesType 3A - based in Zone 2B - which means you only need to take 1 lift to your floorAED 4,999,900Building Amenities:\xa0Indoor link to Dubai MallSky lounge for residents (123rd floor)24/7 ConciergeTennis Court x 2 plus Basketball on SaturdaysGym + Swimming Pool x 2Business Center on 43rd FloorMeeting Rooms on 43rd and 76th FloorZoom Supermarket on Ground Floor6 Armani Restaurants with 15% discount for residentsHousekeeping, carwash and laundry available as a service\xa0Please feel free to contact Eugen at +971504200350 for any additional information.\xa0Burj Khalifa is truly a mixed-use tower, comprises 1.85 million square feet of residential space, and 300,000 square feet of office space, in addition to the Armani Hotel Dubai and Armani Residences. It also features lounges, health and wellness facilities, four pools and two observation decks.\xa0KAYE & CO. is a privately-run real estate firm with more than fifteen years of local industry experience. We are a Burj Khalifa tower focused agency and if you are looking for somebody that can guide you through the tower with few different layouts and views - please contact me to book your site visit today."]

descriptions:
["DescriptionWe are pleased to present this furnished, Pool & Garden view 1 bedroom apartment located in Oceana - Palm Jumeirah, for sale.
About the Apartment:
This elegant, low floor, large furnished one bedroom apartment is located in a beach front community and has a beautiful pool & garden view. Enjoy access to the private the beach club on the beautiful shorelines of the Palm. Equipped with Opus audio, visual and lighting smart home, this apartment comes with a semi open kitchen, decent sized balcony, high ceiling, and floor to ceiling windows which provide plenty of natural light during the day.
Property Highlights:
- 1 Bed + Storage
- Type D
- BUA: 1,338 sq ft
- Bright and Modern Interior
- Built-in Kitchen Appliances
- Built-in Wardrobes
- Marble & Wooden Flooring
- 2 Bathrooms
- 1 Covered Parking
- Large balcony
- Partial Sea & Marina Skyline View
- Beach Front Community
About Oceana:
This luxury residential complex is a resort style community offering private beach access and views of the garden, beach and marina along with a host of features and facilities including:
- Private Beach club
- Well Equipped Gym
- Temperature controlled Infinity Pool
- Children's Pool, Play Area, and Kids Club
- Cafes and Restaurants
- Basement Parking
Oceana is in close proximity of major shopping centers / tourist spots offering a host of recreational activities."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionCall NOW!  -30% from Original Purchase Price of 1,080,000. Larger Layout 659 sqft. Burj Khalifa Views.
An amazing opportunity to purchase this brand new Studio in Marquise Square Business Bay. This modern 29-floor tower is finished to a very high standard with state of the art gym, cinema room and swimming pool. Hand-over is now ready and would make an ideal investment for rental or to live in.
The unit is on a high floor and has spectacular views of the Burj Khalifa. It is conveniently located close to the Dubai Water Canal and a wide range of shop and restaurants. Located in Business Bay, Dubai Mall is also close by as is the Metro. 
● Priced to sell quick

For more details or to arrange a viewing please, contact us at Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties on +971504127168 for our world leading service by our area specialist.']

descriptions: ["DescriptionGreat locationImmaculate conditionType 8Matured landscaped gardenMarble & hard wood flooringVacant on transfer\nHouse Hunters are pleased to offer for sale this immaculate type 8 villa in a quiet tranquil location in Saheel. The villa consists on the ground floor of a living / dining room with floor to ceiling windows, kitchen with breakfast room / family room and doors leading to the pool, maid's room and a powder room. On the first floor, master bedroom en suite complete with wardrobes and overlooks the large lush garden, and two further bedrooms with ample storage space sharing a jack-and-jill bathroom. This villa is one of a kind and should not be missed !\xa0 House Hunters Real Estate are known as the No 1 Preferred Agency in Arabian Ranches. We are the original and only specialist having sold and rented hundreds of properties in the Ranches in our 15 year history. Being present now in the retail center for 11 years, it is understandable why we are the number one choice for both tenants and landlords alike. Landlords have come to learn just how quickly we turn these properties around and as a result we have the most extensive, current list of property in the market.  Permit no.1285474052"]
